intro: 大家好，我名字是狗蛋，你们可以叫我狗蛋。

post.body: Why today I open Zeronet just a few minutes,the state of tor auto change to available,but it is always error before ?为什么今天打开ZeroNet 几分钟后tor的状态自动变为可用了，之前一直是error状态？
![能看图片吗？](http://www.yiqig.cn/uploads/userup/1203/0Q00R02942.jpg)
开着IPFS,上下行网速[非常惊人](http://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmT5AEuxKYnPX19Rx8AUJfK8LwsyKu4bQ7NqgfBN6ro2Es)啊。

[看了这个小视频](http://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmUvTsszmTasSpZsTpz76xpuUGE92kpERffW5cigmTudvD)，总算见识了以前只是听说而已的天朝强拆队，我竟然愤青不起来，不知道是不是麻木了。只能一声叹息，哎.......[After watching the small video](http://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmUvTsszmTasSpZsTpz76xpuUGE92kpERffW5cigmTudvD),I realize the demolition team of China which I have only heard about before,but I can not get angry, can only a sigh of deeply, maybe I am numb. Ai.....
升级后变成tor available了，拉开hello页面的小地球，发现onion连接的peers有256个了   !   !   !是不是更新了什么设置就连GFW也不放在眼里了，哈哈~~~
小游戏，small game  [shetube.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/shetube.bit).
现在保存有22个网站，date文件夹一共占空间145Mb.
New Users.点开Browse All.浏览器就卡死了。一下子人数太多了。

Maybe we can host images on [0chan.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0chan.bit/).This is [a image](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0chan.bit/data/users/1KS1epQ1Z6Aw3x7VzZ1SkpnA8MKbYmqA1b/38b10debfef58623d85041b6c554650f.jpg) on 0chan.But if nobody open the picture at the same time , it dosen't work by this way.IPFS is the better choose.This is [a picture](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmcEtPvBogJJ8XsZ68gbywJERmvMrPsbnQMi9nEN3bbx7p) on IPFS pics
每次更新ZeroNet client ,tor都available，但是过几天就变waiting了，我怀疑是被鬼子盯上这里了。
明天吃什么好呢？开水馒头？还是馒头开水？好纠结。。。。。

第二季Mr.RoBot 好多亮点。[第四集亮点](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmYjRcVh5qF5ZyEeN3LEPP9g6uk1uwj8bEd6KWwUqvX5N5)。第四集[1小时03分18秒](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmYTNF6jZBgjf67rDTco69tXvU7JqGhZ86GirhhgfncEPj)这是什么系统？下面有个IP。[黑窗口聊天](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmZPPhAnUtxCH1EDF9vmGAcjseuuHyY8hTNYXU2AtnnUKn)就是炫酷。第五集，手把手教你[黑入FBI](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmUprkMVLUtu8UoDRetb6QWLTC53Q9NP78xtSpeMkeM53b).第五集的[北京欢迎您](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/Qmenk6EYECpYahrPN8nXuYtfKwCYw7Q2DdCh6uheuVtGtt)亮了。北京也是[这样取暖](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmR5HgkeiYt3nUPLKWa6YkjjtKnAZQyxsrNXGrYYfjRDmJ)的吗？第六集，看得差点懵逼。。
刚升级到rev1425,tor [又可用了](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/Qmc8UxjeG1RVM8LKdZhrPENGp7WdfP84utZLTdhH7AC28q)。我猜明天肯定又不能用。
这两天好安静。

《Mr.Robot 》S02 updating :E01~E08，[BtSync][1] Keys :BOSOVCWZIF2IRKBKHXGEH5GXUMVQKR4KN

《黑客军团》第二季持续更新中，现在更新到：第1集~第8集，带简体中文字幕，[BtSync][2]同步密钥：BOSOVCWZIF2IRKBKHXGEH5GXUMVQKR4KN
[1]:https://www.getsync.com/individuals/
[2]:https://www.getsync.com/individuals/

[Markdown 语法浅析](http://127.0.0.1:43110/12pmgJtrgPfbEkb1pESJL8DUNCtr1MToaH/?Post:14:Zeroblog+Markdown%E8%AF%AD%E6%B3%95%E6%B5%85%E8%BF%B0)，摘自博客[知者無涯](http://127.0.0.1:43110/12pmgJtrgPfbEkb1pESJL8DUNCtr1MToaH/?Home)
ZeroNet client 更新频率好快啊，才几天就更到Rev1509了。看来作者这段时间花时间不少啊。
Zeronet版本更新速度太恐怖了，昨天才rev1510,今天就rev1515了！！看来作者这些天都没闲过。。。

Who knows APP for android which without internet just use bluetooth or wifi direct to connet to each other ,in that way each peer can chat with other peers.Just like [FireChat](http://firech.at),But firechat is not good to use,it needs google serve,my phone has not google serve.Google serve can't use in china,it is upset.Who knows other APP ?

这里有一个自由软件for android，*不用网络（without Internet）*，利用wifi直连或蓝牙与周围同样使用这软件的人p2p互联，互相聊天，传文件。这是人群聚集地的神器啊。

官网链接：http://www.disruptedsystems.org/
github项目链接：https://github.com/Marlinski/Rumble
google商店链接：https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.disrupted.rumble

感谢@zerro提供链接

comment.body: Good job,man.
Thy I can't delete this default message ?
@Kaffie :Thanks ,man.You do a good job.

@Scrub: It dose not work in this message ! I delete in this message,it have deleted my before messages.What is wrong?this is what I do.http://gateway.glop.me/ipfs/QmUnftagVVNV8k3qopyuhNfC6iEM3RUaDergCfXhMfpvYw
@Scrub: Is there any way to recover previous messages ?
@Scrub: 你试一下删除你自己的"Hello ZeroMe!"这条消息，看看是不是跟我一样,会删除之前的消息？谨慎操作。
@Scrub: OK,thank you very much.Base on your Chinese,I can believe that you are not a Chinese,you are an  Australian.0v0
Thanks for giving us a better ZeroMe.Come on,man.We think highly of you.  0v0
不能。
@P2P: 哈哈，好像又有一个bug啊，就是改了名字后，别人之前@你的名字没有变回现在的名字。0v0.
@P2P: 嗯，是的
@P2P: 我今天一直开着zeronet,现在有338个onion的节点了https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmXtBtdP1ULFGCJEE98E9vGHpgfW8e5DeSKRzo2AwrCBtY
@SpartanShield: I mean ZeroMe registers.
@weakish: 你保存的都是大站吧。
看到很多地方有这个单词，我还以为zite是什么意思呢，原来是zerosite的简写。
Translate into Chinese:如果你电脑上的15441端口关闭了，你可以使用一个ssh隧道来加快你网站的发布：（上面第一条命令）            提示，远程主机 sshd 服务需要启用 `GatewayPorts`。（上面第二条命令）。
@weakish: 好的。好冏。
@weakish: 你怎么就用英文呢？？？
@Execin: Yeah,I am not a coder,so some technical term I can't undersatnd.0._.0
@Fav: Is it this  IPFS PIC https://ipfs.pics  ?  It dosen't work on firefox browser.It can't upload picture on firefox,but it works on chrome .
@Dios: My FireFox is version 48.0 too,but it dosen't work.
@Dios: Yes,win10
@Dios: The first one is a woman the second is a dog.No,the dog is not mine,it is a picture I found on the web.

我觉得挺好看的，这第二部牛逼到能黑FBI了。里面讲述了各种黑客技术及社会工程学，虽然感觉是为了剧情好看而做作的，但是该有的点都有了。里面的暗网地址，使用的Kali linux系统，这些都不打码。我特地访问出现过的暗网，都进不了。
@Kaffie: How to seed videos ,I have upload a video,but it is 0 peer.
It is 0 peer now
@Kaffie: I have binded Zerotube to a dot bit domain,but it dose not work:http://127.0.0.1:43110/shetube.bit
@Kaffie: I have watched this video.I have a  question : when I modify the date.json ,I sign it ,it needs a private key ,but this site is not mine ,I don't know which is my private key.
YOu are A girl ?
Nice.
